segments.text: I see the adult woman facing away from the viewer, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate with such concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink overflows, water pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It streams down the cabinet doors, soaking them through.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle laps at her ankle, but she stands firm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly to her right on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the cookie jar sits temptingly in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy perches on the tilting stool, reaching eagerly inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand grabs cookies, the other clutches a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, palm up, eyes fixed on him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies right under her noseâ€”naughty but cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks ready to collapse; it's terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere makes the floor so slippery for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden's bushes sway gently in the breeze.
segments.speaker: PAR
